Level.Script: ShowSingleInBuySingles Log/Showing single information for card at index -VAL:Index- Run/GetCardDataByIndex,Index,-VAL:Index- Run/FormatBuyText AddReply/,,-STR:BuyText-|Run|ShowBuySingleByIndex;;Index;;-VAL:Index-
RemoveSingleInBuySingles Log/Removing all singles information for -VAL:Index- Run/GetCardDataByIndex,Index,-VAL:Index- Run/FormatBuyText RemoveReply/,,-STR:BuyText-
GainPlayerInventoryCards StripItemsFromUnit/Spirit of Card Playing,0,true Run/_GainPlayerInventoryCardsLoop

_GainPlayerInventoryCardsLoop InvToList/Reserve Supplies,ReservesInv SetList/ReverseInventoryIndexes, ForLoop/-InventoryIndex-,0-LASTINLIST[ReservesInv],1,Run,_AddValToList,List Name,ReverseInventoryIndexes,Entry Value,-InventoryIndex-,Add To Beginning,true SetList/ReverseInventoryStrings, ForLoop/-InventoryIndex-,0-LASTINLIST[ReservesInv],1,Run,_AddStringToList,List Name,ReverseInventoryStrings,Entry Value,LIST{ReservesInv,-InventoryIndex-},Add To Beginning,true ForLoop/-InventoryIndex-,0-LASTINLIST[ReservesInv],1,Run,GainCardFromPsyClashCardItem,PsyClashCardItemName,LIST{ReverseInventoryStrings,-InventoryIndex-},InventoryIndex,LIST{ReverseInventoryIndexes,-InventoryIndex-}

GainCardFromPsyClashCardItem SetVal/MatchingIndex,=:-1 Log/Gaining card based on name -STR:PsyClashCardItemName- Run/GetCardIndexByName,CardNameToFind,-STR:PsyClashCardItemName- IfValRun/-VAL:MatchingIndex-,g,-1,_GainCardFromPsyClashCardItemConfirm,PsyClashCardItemName,-STR:PsyClashCardItemName-

_GainCardFromPsyClashCardItemConfirm Log/Awarding the player with the -STR:CardName- card, which matched at index -VAL:MatchingIndex-. Removing inventory index -VAL:InventoryIndex- Run/GetCardDataByIndex,Index,-VAL:MatchingIndex- AddToList/PlayerDeckInactive,-STR:CardName- RemoveItem/Reserve Supplies,-VAL:InventoryIndex-
UpdateDay Log/UpdateDaysPassed: '-VAL:UpdateDaysPassed-' ; Current days passed special character: '-DAYSPASSED-' IfValRun/UpdateDaysPassed,g,-DAYSPASSED-,_UpdateDayConfirm

PickRandomEncounter SetList/ValidEncounters, Run/PickEncounterListName CombineLists/ValidEncounters,-STR:EncounterListName-,ValidEncounters SetVal/RandomEncounterIndex,=:RANGE[0-LASTINLIST[ValidEncounters]] Log/The last valid index for an encounter is 'LASTINLIST[ValidEncounters]'. Setting RandomEncounterIndex to '-VAL:RandomEncounterIndex-'. SetString/RandomEncounterConvId,LIST{ValidEncounters,-VAL:RandomEncounterIndex-} RemoveFromList/-STR:EncounterListName-,-STR:RandomEncounterConvId- Log/Chosen ID is '-STR:RandomEncounterConvId-'

PickEncounterListName SetVal/DaysPassed,=:-DAYSPASSED- SetVal/MaxWeekNumber,=:1 IfValRun/DaysPassed,g=,7,_SetVal,VariableName,MaxWeekNumber,Amount,2 IfValRun/DaysPassed,g=,14,_SetVal,VariableName,MaxWeekNumber,Amount,3 IfValRun/DaysPassed,g=,21,_SetVal,VariableName,MaxWeekNumber,Amount,4 SetString/Pool, SetVal/DayOfTheWeek,=:-DAYOFTHEWEEK- IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,0,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Novice IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,1,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Novice IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,2,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Intermediate IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,3,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Intermediate IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,4,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Intermediate IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,5,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Expert IfValRun/DayOfTheWeek,=,6,_SetString,Variable Name,Pool,String,Expert SetString/EncounterListName,Week-VAL:MaxWeekNumber--STR:Pool-Encounters Log/Pool: '-STR:Pool-' ; DaysPassed: '-VAL:DaysPassed- ; MaxWeekNumber: '-VAL:MaxWeekNumber-' ; EncounterListName -STR:EncounterListName-'

PopulateShop AddStock/Card Shop,Consumables,Assassin AddStock/Card Shop,Consumables,Bandit|Swordsman|Barudit|Golem|Spriggat|Bandit,3 AddStock/Card Shop,Consumables,Mind Blast|Leap|Mind Control|Feedback|Drain|Light Blast|Shadow Blast,3

Dialogue.Branch: /Wow the game started! This dialogue is here so that the editor preview does not run unsafe scripts. Run/RunAllInitializers Time to start the game!/LoadConv/Day Begin

/This is the main game loop dispatch! You should see this at the beginning of a day. This exists so that something distinct happens before going on to the core day loop menu. SetVal/EncountersEnumerated,=:0 Run/UpdateDay Run/ShowButtons Run/PickEncounterListName Run/PopulateShop Time to start the day!/LoadConv/Daily Loop

/Days since starting: -VAL:DaysPassed--NL-Week challenge index: -VAL:MaxWeekNumber--NL-Encounter pool: -STR:Pool- Run/ShowButtons To daily encounter!/LoadConv/Daily Encounter To the shop!/LoadConv/Card Shop Choose Specific Encounter/NamedBranch/Choose
/Pick any encounter Run/EnumerateAllEncounters Back/NewBranch/0
/The player should not see this text, because it should immediately load a new scene. SetVal/UpdateDaysPassed,+:1 AddDayLog/Event,Skipped the day LoadConv/Day Begin EndConvImmediately/ /
Sorter/WELCOME. BUY THINGS. Run/RunAllInitializers Run/ShowButtons AddPortrait/Sorter,Sorter/,left Buy Singles/LoadConv/Buy Singles Neat Shop Window/NamedBranch/OpenShop Back/Load Conv/Daily Loop

Sorter/OF COURSE. WHAT WILL YOU BE PURCHASING TODAY?-NL-(After closing the shop window, each card in your reserves will be added to your inactive Psy Clash cards) ShowInfoBar/ ShowDeckButton/ ShowCalendarButton/ AddCondition/Use Items,true ShowArmyOverviewButton/ AddCondition/Item Use,true ShowShop/Card Shop,false /
/The player should not see this popup, which should immediately go to 0. Run/GainPlayerInventoryCards GoTo/0 /
Sorter/HERE ARE YOUR THINGS. ShowReserveSupplies/ Thanks/NewBranch/0
Sorter/BUY SPECIFIC THINGS. AddPortrait/Sorter,Sorter/,left Run/ShowAllSinglesInBuySingles Back/LoadConv/Intro

Sorter/-STR:CardName-. GOOD CHOICE. THIS -STR:RarityName- WILL COST -VAL:RarityCost-. THIS WOULD BE A GOOD SPOT TO TALK ABOUT THE CARD, PERHAPS. SetVal/Aura,=:-AURA- IfValGoTo/Aura,l,-VAL:RarityCost-,BRANCH[notenoughaura] Buy It!/NamedBranch/Confirm Nevermind!/LoadConv/Buy Singles
/The player should not see this because it should buy the card and proceed. AddToList/PlayerDeck,-VAL:CardName- PlaySound/Coins SetAura/-:-VAL:RarityCost- LoadConv/Buy Singles /
Sorter/-STR:CardName-. THIS -STR:RarityName- WILL COST -VAL:RarityCost-. YOU DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH MONEY. AddPortrait/Sorter,Sorter/,left Too bad/LoadConv/Buy Single

/The player should not see this text, because it should immediately load the random encounter. SetVal/UpdateDaysPassed,+:1 RemoveFromList/list,-STR:RandomEncounterConvId- Run/PickRandomEncounter LoadConv/-STR:RandomEncounterConvId- EndConvImmediately/ /

-STR:OpponentName-/This is the encounter win dialogue. Wow, good job! It isn't customized per your opponent yet, but at least their portrait appears here. You won, so you're going back to the root of the menu. ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/-STR:OpponentName-,-STR:OpponentName-,left AddDayLog/Battle,Victorious versus -STR:OpponentName- in a random encounter Thanks!/NextBranch
/The player should not see this text, because it should immediately load a new scene. Woohoo!/LoadConv/Daily Loop

-STR:OpponentName-/Too bad this is the lose dialogue. There isn't a custom one per opponent, yet. You lost, so you're going back to the root of this menu. AddPortrait/-STR:OpponentName-,-STR:OpponentName-,left AddDayLog/Battle,Defeated by -STR:OpponentName- in a random encounter Darn!/LoadConv/Daily Loop
/The player should not see this text, because it should immediately load a new scene. LoadConv/Daily Loop EndConvImmediately/

-STR:_GeneratedUnit-/I really like bandits. My entire deck, all bandits! SetString/ChosenClass,PICK{Assassin|Axefighter|Cavalier|Swordsman|Engineer|Spearman|Mentalist|Kineticist|Pyrokineticist|Cryokineticist|Photokineticist|Skiakineticist|Psy Healer|Gasul|Barudit|Dark Spriggat|Golden Spriggat|Red Spriggat|Frost Spriggat} SetString/OpponentColor,PICK{Red|Orange|Yellow|Green|White|Black|Violet} GenerateUnique/1,-STR:ChosenClass-,1,RANDOM,,,-1,-1,Down,,,,false,100,0,-1 SetList/OpponentDeck,Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit AddPortrait/-STR:_GeneratedUnit-,-STR:_GeneratedUnit-,right SetString/OpponentName,-STR:_GeneratedUnit- Fight on!/NextBranch

/Player should not see this or the reply. The reply is empty because otherwise it would execute after first opponent turn. CardGame/Encounter Win,Encounter Lost,PlayerDeck,-STR:_GeneratedUnit-,-STR:OpponentColor-,20,0,OpponentDeck,-STR:_GeneratedUnit-,1,2 /

Xerxes Thimblewood/Hey there friend! Care for a casual game of Psy Clash? ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Xerxes Thimblewood,Xerxes/Thimblewood,right,Orange SetString/OpponentName,Xerxes Thimblewood SetList/OpponentDeck,Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Psy Healer|Psy Healer|Swordsman|Shadowling|Shadowling|Solid State Shield|Solid State Shield|Leap|Leap|Mind Shield|Mind Shield|Mind Shield|Mind Shield|Frost Armor|Frost Armor|Frost Armor What can you tell me about your deck?/NamedBranch/Tell Me Let's play!/NextBranch
Xerxes Thimblewood/I love Psy Healers, so my deck is all about healing. It doesn't win much, but I like the sound of Mind Shields. Got it;; thanks. Let's play!/NextBranch

/Player should not see this or the reply. The reply is empty because otherwise it would execute after first opponent turn. CardGame/Encounter Win,Encounter Lost,PlayerDeck,Xerxes Thimblewood,Orange,20,0,OpponentDeck,Xerxes Thimblewood,1,2 /

Jacqueline Milldoor/You play? Sit for five minutes, I could use another win. ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Jacqueline Milldoor,Jacqueline/Milldoor,right,Yellow SetString/OpponentName,Jacqueline Milldoor SetList/OpponentDeck,Gasul|Gasul|Gasul|Bowman|Bowman|Bowman|Bowman|Spriggat|Mentalist|Mentalist|Terror|Terror|Terror|Leap|Leap|Kinetic Gust|Kinetic Gust|Mind Control|Shadow Blast|Shadow Blast What can you tell me about your deck?/NamedBranch/Tell Me Let's play!/NextBranch

Jacqueline Milldoor/This deck is designed to shut you down, and take your things. It'll put the pressure on, and never let off. Mind Control and Shadowblast while I set up a Bowman. Got it;; thanks. Let's play!/NextBranch

/Player should not see this or the reply. The reply is empty because otherwise it would execute after first opponent turn. CardGame/Encounter Win,Encounter Lost,PlayerDeck,Jacqueline Milldoor,Yellow,20,0,OpponentDeck,Jacqueline Milldoor,1,2 /

Legion/Cards? [You have never seen anyone gaze in to your soul so deeply, looking for an answer to this casual game] ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Legion,Legion/,right,Violet SetString/OpponentName,Legion SetList/OpponentDeck,Bandit|Photokineticist|Pyrokineticist|Gasul|Gasul|Swordsman|Swordsman|Swordsman|Swordsman|Fury|Fury|Frost Armor|Frost Armor|Awareness|Awareness|Blinding Cloak|Leap|Leap|Stimulate|Stimulate What can you tell me about your deck?/NamedBranch/Tell Me Let's play!/NextBranch

Legion/I want my minions to hit [i]as hard as possible[/i], and I do that by augmenting them. My plan is to land a few effects like Fury, Awareness, and Blinding Cloak on my minions. My favorite cards are the Photokineticist and the Pyrokineticist. Got it;; thanks. Let's play!/NextBranch

/Player should not see this or the reply. The reply is empty because otherwise it would execute after first opponent turn. CardGame/Encounter Win,Encounter Lost,PlayerDeck,Jacqueline Milldoor,Violet,20,0,OpponentDeck,Jacqueline Milldoor,1,2 /

Lukacs/Heyyyyy! Wow, it's good to be here. You're looking happy, want to play cards? ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Lukacs,Lukacs/,right,Black SetString/OpponentName,Lukacs SetList/OpponentDeck,Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Bandit|Swordsman|Swordsman|Swordsman|Swordsman|Solid State Shield|Solid State Shield|Frost Armor|Frost Armor|Frost Armor|Frost Armor|Fury|Fury|Mind Shield|Mind Shield|Stimulate|Stimulate What can you tell me about your deck?/NamedBranch/Tell Me Let's play!/NextBranch
Lukacs/Oh yeah! Well, this game is complicated, right? So what if I just play cards that make sense? Swordsman is good enough, yeah! Got it;; thanks. Let's play!/NextBranch

/Player should not see this or the reply. The reply is empty because otherwise it would execute after first opponent turn. CardGame/Encounter Win,Encounter Lost,PlayerDeck,Lukacs,Black,20,0,OpponentDeck,Lukacs,1,2 /

ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Ahtram Potatoprince,Ahtram/Potatoprince,right,White SetString/OpponentName,Ahtram Potatoprince SetList/OpponentDeck,Bakery|Bakery|Bakery|Library|Library|Library|Steam Engine|Steam Engine|Steam Engine|Merchant|Merchant|Kinetic Gust|Kinetic Gust|Kinetic Gust|Feedback|Feedback|Feedback|Light Blast|Light Blast|Drain What can you tell me about your deck?/NamedBranch/Tell Me Let's play!/NextBranch

Ahtram Potatoprince/My girlfriend is an Engineer, and she's really got me in to some of these building cards. Like, I just play a Library one turn, and draw for the rest of the game? Sign me up. If I win, it's going to be through my damaging cards like Feedback and Light Blast. Got it;; thanks. Let's play!/NextBranch
